lines.text: I had my swimming pool dug by an International Projects steam shovel. It's a darling shovel.

Miss Partridge, you see, I am a businessman. All my life I've concentrated on business. Now, this has necessarily forced me to devote more of my time to some things and less to others. You understand.
The solid gold Cadillac. Well, we had to call it something.
Well, I've read a lot of it.
Well, take my advice and don't play it! It's so tiring! They don't let you sit down unless you're a king!
